visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the monthly rainfall data for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes a border and plot border, with additional spacing on the left. The background color is set to a light gray for better contrast. The x-axis represents the months of the year with styled labels, and the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters, also with styled labels and a title. The data series includes the monthly rainfall data, with a custom color applied to the series. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart presentation.
